text.title: UK Supreme Court require government to release Prince Charles 'black spider' letters
text.head: UK Supreme Court require government to release Prince Charles 'black spider' letters
Related news

list.item: "Attorney General vetos release of Prince Charles correspondence" — Wikinews, October 18, 2012

text.head: Sources

list.item: Rob Evans, Robert Booth and Rowena Mason. "Supreme court clears way for release of secret Prince Charles letters" — The Guardian , March 26, 2015
Chris Green. "Prince Charles' 'black spider' letters to be published 'within weeks'" — The Independent , March 26, 2015
Attorney General's Office. "Evans v (1) Information Commissioner (2) seven Government Departments [2012] UKUT 313 (AAC)" — GOV.UK , October 16, 2012
